channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Rain soaks Rose Parade in California and snow squalls hit Midwest and Northeast on first day of 2026
item.description: Rained poured down on the iconic Rose Parade for the first time in 20 years. That was as flood warnings and evacuation orders in Southern California joined snow squalls and frigid temperatures in the Northeast and Midwest to mark the first day of 2026.
